attributes.action: make exemptions to the health act (2006)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Smoking in public places from July 1st 2007 will be illegal in England, with few exemptions. This act was rushed through and not thought thought properly and there  is no reason why certain "public places" such as private members clubs and some pubs cannot allow smoking without prosecution, especially when the proven risks have shown to be minimal, 'The effects of other people smoking in my presence is so small it doesn't worry me.' (Sir Richard Doll - 2001)
